brca1.description: Determine if the pathology report mentions results from genetic testing for mutations in BRCA1.
enumDescriptions: Assign 'Y': if the report indicates that mutations were detected in BRCA1.
Assign, 'N': if the report indicates that mutations were not detected in BRCA1.
Assign null: if there is no mention of results from BRCA1 genetic testing in the report or if the BRCA1 mutation status cannot be determined from the information in the report.

brca2.description: Determine if the pathology report mentions results from genetic testing for mutations in BRCA2.
enumDescriptions: Assign 'Y': if the report indicates that mutations were detected in BRCA2.
Assign, 'N': if the report indicates that mutations were not detected in BRCA2.
Assign null: if there is no mention of results from BRCA2 genetic testing in the report or if the BRCA2 mutation status cannot be determined from the information in the report.
